content: a really quick and easy little strap pouch for your phone that keeps your device safe and your hands free a cute quick gift that is super customisable in sizes yarn types colours and details i recommend a durable yarn with little to no stretch i used nakyangyarn s if a sturdy cotton yarn that comes in a variety of colours and is reminiscent of thin rope in its texture use a hook that works with your yarn of choice the pouch is worked continuously in a spiral you can put a marker for the beginning of the round but i honestly just eyeballed it you can use any d-rings / o-rings / hooks / whatever for cute accents
